CLIENT ACCOUNTS COORDINATOR (for Web Projects)
About the Job


Client Accounts Coordinator (for Web
Projects)


Position Description


To start, this junior position will be responsible for coordinating
projects for all areas of the Web Services Department: Web Design, SEO/Online
Marketing, Website Migrations, and Web Maintenance. This role will act as the
gatekeeper for all web projects to ensure the full life cycle of the project is
managed properly, from billing, provisioning/order fulfillment, to ongoing
account management. The individual occupying this role MUST have superior
documentation and organizational skills backed up expert Microsoft Excel
and Word skills.


Career Path: As the Web Services Department grows further, this position
will have the opportunity to branch out into either a Web Designer role or a
Web Accounts Management role.


Position Type:  Full-time, permanent, salary +bonus, benefits. Some occasional extra
hours will be expected for time sensitive projects and deadlines.


Position Responsibilities



This is a
client facing role but will also require daily internal communications and
coordination as well:


Coordinate and track all web projects,
contracts, and orders in CRM system and/or Excel spreadsheets
Work with Billing Team to ensure all orders
are billed accurately and on time
Work with the Technical Provisioning/Order
Fulfillment Team to ensure service is delivered according to contracts
Facilitate the provisioning of project work by
following up with customers on outstanding items that may be impacting the
delivery of their service
Manage customer accounts through daily
email/phone communications to the clients to provide status updates





Qualifications, Skills and
Experience Required


MUST
HAVE:


Web knowledge: must have a
very strong understanding of web concepts and web technologies: web
design, online marketing, search engine optimization, domain
registrations, etc.)
Account Management skills:
previous client account management experience
Administrative skills:
previous role as a Provisioning Coordinator would be preferred
Documentation skills: must
be able to document client information, project information, ticketing
information, invoice numbers, and dollar values with 100% accuracy
Communications skills: must
be able to communicate technical information comfortably and clearly
between multiple parties to effectively
coordinate technical detail to ensure projects are delivered as expected
and within scope
Must be extremely organized
Overall technical understanding of website
design and development
Must be able to work under tight deadlines and
competing priorities
Multi-tasking skills along with high
efficiency and high productivity output a MUST





NICE TO HAVE (Having these skills will make
this role easier but is not necessary to perform the role):


Graphic design skills (ie.
Photoshop)
Technical familiarity with
other Open Source CMS applications, Flash design skills, Photoshop
(graphic design skills)
Previous experience working with a variety of
web sites and setting up email accounts
Technical expertise supporting websites
developed with any or all of the following: HTML, PHP, Perl, MySQL,
.htaccess, ASP, ASP.NET, MSSQL, web form configurations, etc.
Technical expertise with domain setup and
administration: registrations, transfers, DNS records, etc along with
familiarity with a variety of Control Panels an asset.
Technical familiarity with setting up and
configuring Open source CMS applications (ie. Joomla, Wordpress,
osCommerce, Zencart, phpBB, etc.)
Some code debugging skills along with advanced
web skills including cron and SSL an asset





Our ideal candidate will be a dependable, self-motivated, efficient top
performer that brings in their "A" game EVERY DAY and never settles
for second best. You are customer focused and driven to exceed expectations for
every task you perform. You are more than willing and able to put in extra
hours and extra efforts to get the job done right and on time. If you believe
you are this candidate, send us your updated resume demonstrating your recent
accomplishments along with some ideas on how you think you may be able
contribute to our Team.


IMPORTANT: When
applying, please state your minimum base salary requirements. We thank
all interested candidates but only qualified candidates will be contacted. A
COVER LETTER MUST BE INCLUDED.
